snippet: Texas Coach Charlie Strong said the junior quarterback David Ash had given up football after struggling with the effects of multiple concussions.
abstract: Texas junior quarterback David Ash decides that he will no longer play football after struggling with the effects of multiple concussions; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Texas Coach Charlie Strong said the junior quarterback David Ash had given up football after struggling with the effects of multiple concussions.

headline.main: Texas’ David Ash Quits After Concussions
